promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute mythical parrot psychic-type pokemon with a ornate tail. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or parrot. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptawke, a a chibi cute mythical parrot psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Psydrive. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "parrot", "psychic" or "Cryptawke". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, parrot-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Found in secluded catacombs, this charming feathered mystic uses Psydrive to tap into cryptic secrets, sharing wisdom through cheerful chatter.
